titleStmt.title: A booke of Bertram the priest, concerning the body and blood of Christ written in Latin to Charles the Great, being Emperour, aboue eight hundred yeeres agoe. Translated and imprinted in the English tongue. Anno Dnj. 1549.
De corpore et sanguine Domini. English
titleStmt.author: Ratramnus, monk of Corbie, d. ca. 868.

titleStmt.title: A booke of Bertram the priest, concerning the body and blood of Christ written in Latin to Charles the Great, being Emperour, aboue eight hundred yeeres agoe. Translated and imprinted in the English tongue. Anno Dnj. 1549.
De corpore et sanguine Domini. English
titleStmt.author: Ratramnus, monk of Corbie, d. ca. 868.
Lynde, Humphrey, Sir.

editionStmt.edition: And now the third time published for the profit of the reader. 1623.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: De corpore et sanguine Domini.
A different translation from that of William Hugh.
With a final errata leaf; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
